alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 20 at 4:05AM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Fire Weather Watch remains in effect for Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 222 and 229 which includes Fremont and Huerfano Counties... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 222 AND 229... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 222 and 229. * Winds...West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg
